description: In this session we build a Chuck Norris joke-telling Chat Bot! We'll write our bot using Python and package it up as a Docker image. You'll learn about Webhooks and their importance in cloud applications, Micro-Services and the Cisco Spark Collaboration Cloud. This session is designed to be fun and hands on, so make sure to bring your laptop, sense of humor and great questions!
title: Build a Chat Bot with Chuck Norris, Python and Docker (Tutorial)
